trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle row-related events of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 행 관련 이벤트를 처리 하는 메서드를 나타냅니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewRowEventHandler handles the following <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> events: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultValuesNeeded> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.NewRowNeeded> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDefaultCellStyleChanged> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextChanged> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeaderCellChanged> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightChanged> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowMinimumHeightChanged> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowUnshared> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserAddedRow> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserDeletedRow> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripChanged> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDividerHeightChanged> When you create a DataGridViewRowEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 다음을 처리 하는 DataGridViewRowEventHandler <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>이벤트:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultValuesNeeded>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.NewRowNeeded>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDefaultCellStyleChanged>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextChanged>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeaderCellChanged>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightChanged>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowMinimumHeightChanged>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowUnshared>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserAddedRow>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserDeletedRow>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripChanged>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDividerHeightChanged>이벤트를 처리 하는 메서드를 식별 하는 DataGridViewRowEventHandler 대리자를 만들 때.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDividerHeightChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserDeletedRow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserAddedRow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowUnshared> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowMinimumHeightChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeaderCellChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDefaultCellStyleChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.NewRowNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultValuesNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 이벤트 처리기를 연결 하려면 대리자의 인스턴스 이벤트에 추가 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 대리자를 제거 하지 않으면 이벤트가 발생할 때마다 이벤트 처리기가 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 이벤트 처리기 대리자에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [NIB: 이벤트 및 대리자](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)합니다.
